full_description:
SINGER 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Green SRAC-SAS12CBR32LVSGRIH-CO)

The SINGER 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Green SRAC-SAS12CBR32LVSGRIH-CO), with a cooling capacity of 12000 BTU, provides efficient and effective cooling for spaces. With its one-key easy airflow direction change feature, which lets customers customize airflow to their tastes, it guarantees comfortable air dispersion. Easy-to-clean detachable filters are a feature of the SINGER 1-Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Green SRAC-SAS12CBR32LVSGRIH-CO) that makes maintenance easier and guarantees clean air quality. Users can enjoy cooling without being concerned about using too much electricity thanks to an energy-saving mode that can save up to 60% of the energy used. With a rated power input of 1550 and a rated current of 7.5, the air conditioner operates with a dependable performance within the voltage range of 230V/50Hz/1. Its rotary compressor type guarantees effective cooling, and the Hi/Mi/Lo indoor airflow settings allow you to customize the amount of airflow that you want. All things considered, the SINGER 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Green SRAC-SAS12CBR32LVSGRIH-CO) blends cutting-edge functionality, low energy consumption, and simple maintenance, making it a dependable option for cooling requirements in a variety of settings.

SINGER 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Green SRAC-SAS18CBR32LVSGRIH-CO)

The SINGER 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Green SRAC-SAS18CBR32LVSGRIH-CO) comes with a cooling capacity of 18000 BTU/h and a cooling power input of 1877W. This AC unit is capable of providing powerful and efficient cooling for large rooms. It is equipped with an energy-efficient EER rating of 3.01 and uses eco-friendly refrigerant R32. The AC helps you save on your energy bills while being kind to the environment. It also features a Jet Cool function that quickly cools down your space, as well as an auto-restart function, dehumidifying function, and automatic temperature control for your convenience. The SINGER 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Green SRAC-SAS18CBR32LVSGRIH-CO) comes with a sleep mode and a 24-hour timer function. You can also choose from different fan speed steps, including Turbo/H/M/L/Auto, to customize your cooling experience. It features Hotstart, Self Clean+, and Zone flow functions. It delivers an impressive indoor airflow volume of 950/900/730/600 m3/h. The SINGER 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Green SRAC-SAS18CBR32LVSGRIH-CO) features a sturdy and durable design, with an outdoor unit resistance class of IPX4, a rotary compressor type, and an aluminum condenser fin type with hydrophilic coating.
